about.title:
I'm Mohammad Baqer Kohie
Frontend Developer
about.desc: Hi, I'm Mohammad Bagher Koohi, a frontend web developer and programmer. My goal is to help you bring the best version of your website to the online world, as I am committed to enhancing user experience and optimizing website performance. With creative ideas and advanced technologies, I will accompany you on this journey to create the best possible outcome for your website.

experiance.text: Experience working as a freelancer on several projects.
Designing multiple web projects, including a chat application and an online store website.
Experience of participating in multiple programming competitions as an individual and as part of a team.
Participation in a hackathon as a team member and obtaining the second place.

contact.title: You can reach me any timeðŸ™‚

item.description: Connect with others in real-time and easily exchange messages with this secure and reliable chat app website developed using React and Firebase.
Discover a wide range of high-quality engineering products and services with this sleek and modern website developed using JavaScript.
Discover a wide range of beautiful plants and accessories for your home with this stunning Plant shop website developed using React.
Efficiently manage your tasks and stay organized with this intuitive and easy-to-use Todo app developed using React.
Perform fast and accurate calculations with this simple and user-friendly calculator app developed using JavaScript.
Quickly search and discover the perfect emoji for your message with this intuitive and user-friendly emoji searcher app developed using React.
